menuItems.name: Smash Burger
menuItems.description: A double patty, seasoned chuck burger with smash sauce, grilled onions and cheddar cheese.
menuItems.fullDescription: Patty size - 4 oz. each. Smash sauce - mustard, mayo, honey. Yellow onions. Cheddar cheese.

menuItems.name: Beef Burger
menuItems.description: A single beef, season beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
menuItems.fullDescription: Patty size - 8 oz. each. Lettuce, tomato, pickles. Seasoned with salt, pepper, garlic powder.

menuItems.name: Fries
menuItems.description: Hand-cut fries seasoned with salt, pepper and garlic powder.
menuItems.fullDescription: Russet potatoes seasoned with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Fried in vegetable oil in an air fryer.
